list.definition: select time,rp from forever.grafana_rp where time > now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
list.name: rp
list.query: select time,rp from forever.grafana_rp where time > now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement" WITH KEY = "box"
list.name: box
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement" WITH KEY = "box"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement" WITH KEY = "interface"
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$measurement" WITH KEY = "interface"
